BasicInfo.short: Pecabu is a tech startup that focuses on the industries of big data, cloud-computing, mobile, advertising, and media.

Products.name: CineGraph
Products.description: CineGraph is the first Smart-OOH advertising platform that can detect viewer demographics near a screen and play only the most relevant ads.

news.title: Electronic billboards are going to know who's watching them | VentureBeat | Marketing | by Barry Levine
